text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium carneum is a fungus species of the genus of Penicillium Penicillium roqueforti var. carneum was reclassified to Penicillium carneum Penicillium carneum was isolated from spoiled meat products, silage, rye bread, water, beer, cheese, mouldy barkers yeast and cork Penicillium carneum produces patulin, penicillic acid, penitrem A, mycophenolic acid roquefortines
